Package helper

Class AppointmentsQuery

java.lang.Object
helper.AppointmentsQuery
public abstract class AppointmentsQuery extends Object
This helper provides queries that connect the SQL appointment table to the Java program.

      Inserts a new row of appointments. Used in Add Appointment Controller.
      Parameters:
      Title - Title
      Description - Description
      Location - Location of meeting
      Type - Type of meeting
      Start - Start date and time of meeting
      End - End date and time of meeting
      Customer_ID - Customer ID involved with meeting
      User_ID - User ID involved with meeting
      Contact_ID - Contact ID involved with meeting
